Events that occurred on 10 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1920 - Voice actor Victor Platt is born.
1929 - Writer and actor Bernard Mayes is born.
1936 - Stanley Unwin reads the typescript of The Hobbit.
1964 - The first episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
1964 - Voice actor Quinton Flynn is born.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mary Fairburn.
1969 - Actor Manu Bennett is born.
1979 - The Jackanory episode "Fire and Water" is aired on the BBC.
2006 - The J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia is published.
2010 - Chilean Tolkien Society's Mereth Oronnad.
2010 - Minecraft Middle-Earth begins building Middle-Earth.
2017 - Middle-earth: Shadow of War is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
With Frodo severely wounded, Strider and the four hobbits travel slowly towards Rivendell.
Glorfindel travels towards the Last Bridge.
Gandalf hurries towards Rivendell after the Black Riders attacked him on Weathertop.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
